程序包的使用
pacman.model

  • 使用pacman.model的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    pacman.model  
  • pacman.model使用的pacman.model中的类 
    类和说明
    BarObstacle
    This class defines a rectangle that only has one unit width and any unit length
    Cookie
    The class defines a round cookie.
    DoublePortals
    This class contains two specific portals, leftPortal and rightPortal.
    GameModel
    This class represents the game board that contains game objects.
    Ghost
    This class defines a ghost as a running thread.
    GhostBarObstacle
    This class is a special bar obstacle for ghost but not the pacman.
    LevelEntry
    This class defines a rectangular level entry that can be set visible or not.
    Maze
    This class contains a set of bar obstacles obstacles and a set of ghost bar obstacles ghostObstacles.
    Portal
    This class defines a rectangular portal.
    Score
    This class stores score of the game, including Text score and Text lifes.
    SuperCookie
    This class defines a special Cookie that can be used to bonus the pacman.
    ThePacman
    This class defines a pacman as the leading actor of the game.
